memberdef.name: nrf_vmc_ram_block_config

briefdescription.para: Function for setting power configuration for the particular RAM block.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
RAM block number.
Bitmask with sections configuration of particular RAM block. nrf_vmc_power_t should be use to prepare this bitmask.
Bitmask with sections configuration of particular RAM block. nrf_vmc_retention_t should be use to prepare this bitmask.
